citations.narrative:
The Continency Plan has not been reviewed by the licensee on at least an annual basis. The last review of the
Contingency Plan was completed more than one year ago on 2/23/23.
Per this Section, all exhibitors must review their Continency Plan on at least an annual basis to ensure that it adequately
addresses potential emergency situations that could be detrimental to the health and well-being of the animals. Licensee
corrected this item at the time of the inspection by reviewing the Plan and by documenting the review. To remain
corrected from this date 7/25/24 forward.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with Licensee.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The Continency Plan has not been reviewed by the licensee on at least an annual basis. The last review of the 
Contingency Plan was completed more than one year ago on 2/23/23.  
 
Per this Section, all exhibitors must review their Continency Plan on at least an annual basis to ensure that it adequately 
addresses potential emergency situations that could be detrimental to the health and well-being of the animals. Licensee 
corrected this item at the time of the inspection by reviewing the Plan and by documenting the review. To remain 
corrected from this date 7/25/24 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with Licensee.  
 
*END OF REPORT* 
 
 n
